name: Gold of the Spirit
description:
Click on the title to begin the story. Use full-screen mode.

Gold of the Spirit is a narrative based, interactive game that sees Peter, an aspiring alchemist, doing anything he can to gain the respect from his alchemy teacher, Hermann. As the reader, you can decide how Peter approaches the situations that come his way.

I hope that you enjoy the narrative and feel free to leave any feedback in the comments.
